title: MembershipInvitation
description: JSON schema for MembershipInvitation POJO. \nNote: certain fields may be omitted when returned if the field value is null.

teamId.description: The id of the Team which the user is invited to join.

inviteeId.description: The principal ID of the user being invited to join the Team.

inviteeEmail.description: The email address of the user being invited to join the Team.

createdOn.description: The date this MembershipInvitation was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this MembershipInvitation.
createdBy.title: Created By
